item.description:
Bring your bike or your walking shoes to the Cape Cod Canal for a scenic journey. We'll ride/walk for an hour or so and then head off to lunch. If you do not want to walk or ride, you can come and sit on a bench along the Canal and read a book.

Directions to Meeting Spot Note that this may not be on the GPS, so please follow these easy directions.
Go over the Bourne Bridge
Take your first right at the rotary
Take an immediate right - to end (Veteran's)
Take a right onto Sandwich Road
Turn left into Bourne Recreation Area

Restrooms available at parking lot.

Attention bikers: Please wear a helmet and bring water.

We'll go to the Lobster Trap for lunch. Looks like a great place: http://www.lobstertra...
item.name: Bike or Walk the Cape Cod Canal
